alert.note: Alert for Coastal Nueces; Inland Nueces (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Corpus Christi (Corpus Cristi, Victoria and Laredo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 01 at 2:38PM CDT by NWS Corpus Christi
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Nueces County through 315 PM CDT... At 237 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms near Corpus Christi International Airport and just west of Chapman Ranch, moving south at 5 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Corpus Christi, Robstown, Corpus Christi International Airport, Del Mar College Windward Campus, Corpus Christi Country Club, South Texas Botanical Gardens, Cabaniss Field, Kings Crossing Subdivision, Cole Park, Del Mar College Heritage Campus, Clarkwood, Petronila, Chapman Ranch and Tuloso. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
